attributes.action: Allow All Students Over The Age Of 11 To Get Any Haircut They Wish.
attributes.additional_details:
No skin fades
No fades
All Haircuts Must Fade Proparly 
No Man Buns
No Dying Your Hair
No hair too long
attributes.background: In My School Boys Cannot Get Below A Grade 2 On Their Hair. It Makes  almost every boy in my school insecure about whether their peers will bully them, if they choose to get a ‘good’ haircut they will be put in isolation.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament. You could raise this with your school's governing body.
